name: Unidentified Fish-Killing Object
description:
You're the Unidentified Fish-Killing Object, shooting down space-fish and using your recoil to pick up the remains while dodging asteroids and the authorities!

Full Screen isn't required, but is highly recommended if you're using mouse controls!

Made for Mini Jam #91: UFO.

Controls:

  • ESC to pause.

Mouse:

  • Mouse to aim
  • Hold Left Click to charge attack, release to shoot.

Keyboard/Controller:

  • Change angle with Left + Right/W+S
  • Hold X/L/Space to charge, release to shoot.
